sentences.sContent: For viral infections, including stomach flu (gastroenteritis) and mononucleosis, the best treatment is often rest and plenty of fluids.
sentences.sContent_eng: For viral infections, including stomach flu (gastroenteritis) and mononucleosis, the best treatment is often rest and plenty of fluids.
sentences.sCn: 对于肠胃型流感（肠胃炎）和单核细胞增多症这些病毒感染来说，最好的治疗方法通常是休息以及大量饮水。

sentences.sContent: Bilateral cervical adenopathy is also prominent in tuberculosis coccidioidomycosis infectious mononucleosis toxoplasmosis sarcoid lymphomas and leukemias.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bilateral cervical adenopathy is also prominent in tuberculosis coccidioidomycosis infectious mononucleosis toxoplasmosis sarcoid lymphomas and leukemias.
sentences.sCn: 双侧颈部腺病在结核、球孢子菌病、传染性单核细胞增多症、弓形虫病、肉样瘤、淋巴瘤和白血病。

trans.tranOther: Mononucleosis is a disease which causes swollen glands, fever, and a sore throat
